short_desc: Operates and maintains rail transit lines in San Francisco, Alameda, Contra Costa and part of San Mateo counties
description: Operates and maintains five rapid rail lines that  link 43 stations in San Francisco, Alameda and Contra Costa counties and the northwestern corner of San Mateo County. Operates direct service to San Francisco International Airport and a bus link to Oakland International Airport. Trains typically run every 15 minutes.TDD users can contact any telephone number through the California Relay Service at 800-735-2929 or 800-735-2922 (voice).
